winecidermead.name: Strawberry Wine
winecidermead.description: This light refreshing wine offers the delightfully sweet aroma of fresh picked strawberries blended with a rich melange of honey, tropical fruit and floral flavors.

winecidermead.name: Cardinal Rosé
winecidermead.description: Light, fruity blush‑colored rosé with strawberry notes—ideal for warm‑weather sipping.

winecidermead.name: Maple Mead
winecidermead.description: A Semi - Sweet Acerglyn Mead made from a blend of Tupelo Honey, Manuka Honey, Wildflower Honey, and Maple Syrup. It has delicate buttery, caramelized honey, maple, and oak tasting notes.

winecidermead.name: Bee City
winecidermead.description: Our flagship sparkling session mead made with WG Bee Farm's wildflower honey! It provides delicate tasting notes of sweet honey and floral undertones with an apple cider like finish! Name is in honor of both The City of Martinsville and The Town of Ridgeway being Bee City USA Affiliates.

winecidermead.name: Tupelo Mead
winecidermead.description: A Semi-Sweet Mead made with 100% Tupelo honey that has delicate buttery tasting notes with hints of citrus, floral, and rosewater undertones!

winecidermead.name: Strawberry Rhubarb Vanilla Mead
winecidermead.description: A Sweet Mead that has delicate tasting notes of sweet honey, strawberry, rhubarb, and vanilla!

winecidermead.name: Orange Blossom Mead
winecidermead.description: A mead made from Orange Blossom honey that has tasting notes of sweet honey and citrus upfront with floral undertones and a warming complex alcohol in the finish!

winecidermead.name: Orchard Drive
winecidermead.description: Our Flagship cider made with a blend of Macintosh and Granny Smith Apples. Crisp and refreshing, it highlights both the tartness and the sweetness of the apples.

winecidermead.name: Pearadise
winecidermead.description: Made from Pears, this Pear Cider is sweet and fruity upfront but finishes tart, clean, crisp, and dry.

winecidermead.name: Maple Wine
winecidermead.description: A Sweet Maple Wine that has delicate tasting notes of maple, oak, and slightly floral and woody undertones! Made from 100% Grade B Maple Syrup!

winecidermead.name: Maple Wine
winecidermead.description: A Sweet Maple Wine that has delicate tasting notes of maple, oak, and slightly floral and woody undertones! Made from 100% Grade B Maple Syrup!
